What is new for you:

- We have revamped the authentication infrastructure so that you won’t be automatically logged out after certain amount of inactivity. This update will also enable us to provide you with more secure and innovative login experie

Bug fixes to improve your overall experience and adds strength to the previous release.

Dear beloved customers! In this release we fixed some of your pain points and added a few features that can help you run your business better:

- [Bug Fix] We now display the last 4 digits of the bank account number on the transfer funds screen.

Dear beloved customers! In this release we're very excited to introduce the following:

- [New Feature] Save time! Now you can use your fingerprint/Touch ID to log into the app.
- [Fixes] Overall performance improvements.

- [Fixes] Bug & crash fixes.

Dear beloved customers! In this release we're very excited to introduce the following:

- [New Feature] Save time! Now you can use your fingerprint/Touch ID to log into the app.
- [Fixes] Overall performanc
- [Fixes] Bug & crash fixes.

Dear customers, this update brings the following bug fixes and enhancements:
- [Fix] Ability to accept tip on the reader for higher amounts.
- [Fix] Ability to print receipts on LAN based Star Printers.
- [Enhancement] Refraining the app from

Dear customers, this release brings the following fixes:

- [Fix] Bank transfer and withdrawals should now be completed within the same day, just like before.
- [Fix] Bug fixes and enhancements.
- [Fix] Bug fixes and enhancements.

Get paid anywhere your business takes you with our latest PayPal Here App and card readers.

Dear customers, this update brings the following set of fixes:

- [Fix] Sales detail now displays the location information for all transactions.
- UI fixes and improvements.
- Printer fixes and improvements.
- iOS 11 compatibility fixes.
Thanks for using PayPal Here. Our latest update includes performance & reliability improvements.

Thanks for using PayPal Here. Our latest update includes reliability improvements & crash fixes.
Thanks for using PayPal Here. This update includes performance & reliability improvements.
This update includes an updated app icon and navigation bar, along with enhanced support for iPhone X. We've also fixed a few bugs and improved performance.
This update includes an updated app icon and navigation bar, along with enhanced support for iPhone X. We've also fixed a few bugs including printer-related issues.

Thanks for using PayPal Here.

This update includes an improved tipping experience. The tip screen now appears after a payment is collected—a smooth and efficient experience for both you and your customers.

- Resolves an issue that was causing some users to be logged out during a transaction
- Improves support for FaceID
- Accessibility & screen reader improvements when blueto

Thanks for using PayPal Here. This version includes:
- User management is now fixed (access the feature via the in-app Settings).
- We've also added performance & reliability improvements.

- Fixed an issue that was causing the app to load slowly on some devices
- Performance & reliability improvements

Thanks for using PayPal Here. This release includes performance and reliability improvements.

You can now see your users' sales by payment type (credit card, invoice, cash, or check). Just tap on Sales Activity, then Sales Reports, and "View Details." Add users to your account via User Management in the app settings.
